localised_description.last_approved_text: Those who revel in wanton destruction exalt ruin, desolation, and madness as virtues above all else and to the bitter, blood-spattered end.

frontend_faction_groups.localised_description: Those who revel in wanton destruction exalt ruin, desolation, and madness as virtues above all else and to the bitter, blood-spattered end.

localised_description.last_approved_text: There are those whose very existence brings balance to and sheds light upon an otherwise grim, miserable, shadow-filled world.

frontend_faction_groups.localised_description: There are those whose very existence brings balance to and sheds light upon an otherwise grim, miserable, shadow-filled world.
